markdown:
These skeletons retain the cunning they possessed in life. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Skeletal Champion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3194) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 312 1.1 **Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** -1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9), [Lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10) --- **AC** 19 (21 with shield raised) **Fort** +5 **Ref** +10 **Will** +6 **HP** 25 ([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83)) **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 5, [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=586) 5, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604) 5, piercing 5, slashing 5 **[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=75)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** longsword +10 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+4 slashing **Melee** claw +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 1d6+4 slashing **Melee** lance +10 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [jousting d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=186), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d8+4 piercing
name: Skeletal Champion
